diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Acute pancreatitis with acute renal failure
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with symptoms suggestive of pancreatitis, including elevated lipase levels (1485) and acute renal failure (Cre of 6.2). Differential diagnoses included coronary artery disease and a lung mass, both significant due to the patient's history of CAD and recent STEMI. Imaging revealed a large mass in the right upper lobe and multiple nodules, indicating the presence of a lung mass.
